text: Mahmoud Sadeghi () is an Iranian lawyer, jurist, academic and reformist politician. He is a member of the Parliament of Iran representing Tehran, Rey, Shemiranat and Eslamshahr electoral district. On 25 February 2020, during the 2019â€“20 coronavirus pandemic, Sadeghi tested positive for SARS-CoV-2, the virus that causes coronavirus disease 2019.https://www.msn.com/en- us/news/world/coronavirus-live-updates-irans-deputy-health-minister-tests- positive/ar-BB10lO9z?ocid=spartandhp ==References== Category:Living people Category:1962 births Category:Iranian politicians Category:Iranian lawyers
title: Mahmoud Sadeghi
